name: Donut County
notes: Has errors near end of install, but after selecting OK to all errors the installer finishes and game runs correctly.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Donut County/DonutCounty.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /LANG=English /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
